short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to store and manage Chrome browser tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üí°Simplify your digital life with just a click!

Store Me, the ultimate Chrome extension, revolutionizes how you manage browser tabs. Effortlessly group, store, and organize your tabs for a clutter-free browsing experience. Whether for work, study, or leisure, Store Me brings order to your online chaos, enhancing productivity and freeing up mental space. Embrace a tidier, more efficient digital world. Try it now and transform your tab management forever!

üîç Your All-In-One Tab Management Solution

Store Tabs: Effortlessly group and stash away your chosen tabs. Keep your workspace clean and organized.

Store All Tabs: With a single action, safeguard all your active tabs. Perfect for fast-paced workflows or sudden switches.

Rename Tabs: Personalize your tab groups with custom names for quick identification and better organization.

New Window: Pop open any group in a new window, ideal for separating different tasks or areas of work.

Add to Group: Integrate new tabs into existing groups, keeping related content neatly together.

Delete Tabs: Clear out old groups from Store Me to maintain an updated, clutter-free digital space.

Export Tabs: Backup your tab arrangements as a JSON file, ensuring no loss of important groupings.

Import Tabs: Effortlessly restore your tab setups using the JSON file, perfect for syncing across devices.

Drag and Drop: Click and hold the tab you want to move and drag it over the a selected space.

? - Instant Help: Lost or need a quick tip? Hit the '?' for immediate access to our user guide and instructional videos.

Enhance Your Productivity and Workspace üöÄ

Improved Organization: With 'Store Me,' organizing your tabs becomes intuitive and effortless, leading to a more structured and accessible digital environment.

Space Saving: Say farewell to overcrowded toolbars. Our extension condenses your tabs into neat, manageable groups, freeing up screen space.

Reduced Overload: By efficiently managing your tabs, reduce cognitive overload and focus better on the task at hand.

Adaptability: Tailored for everyone, Store Me adapts to your unique browsing needs, whether you're studying, working, or browsing for leisure.

Convenience: Our extension is crafted for ease of use - manage your tabs with minimal effort and maximum efficiency.

Take Control of Your Digital Workspace Today! üí°

Ready to streamline your browsing experience? Download Store Me now and step into a world where tab management is a breeze, not a burden. Join the ranks of organized, efficient web users and elevate your digital workspace today!
